name: Spit & Dice
description:
You made a bet with a sorcerer and got caught cheating, now he's turned you into a dice-spitting puppet to teach you a lesson.
Try to escape from this dice dungeon without being electrocuted to death
The ending is a little anticlimactic since I didn't have time to finish it xd

Made by one person in 48 hours for GMTK jam 2022

HOW TO PLAY
WASD - MOVE
SPACE - JUMP
J - SPIT  A DICE
J - SWALLOW WHEN CLOSE TO A DICE

CREDITS
FREE Music assets by: Abstraction (Connected, Three Red Hearts)
Art, Programing, Game and Level Desing : Kanart
